DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Acupuncture Prophylaxis Intrathecal Morphine Induced Pruritis Patients Undergoing Caesarean Delivery
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : ASA I & II patient undergo elective caesarean delivery spinal intrathecal morphine Exclusion criterion : Patient refusal ASA III & IV patient Preexisting pruritis Eczema Bleeding tendency Known allergy medication use Any contra indication spinal anaesthesia
